name: Not My Atmosphere
description:
Submission for the 8 bits to Infinity Run Jam

Within these city wall you reside. An evil corporation has taken over the city, and has corrupted the government with it. You can't make the change yourself, nor do you think anyone local will help. Your best bet resides outside the walls, but getting there won't be an easy task. Run, jump, and slide your way across rooftops with the aid of your newest gravity defying shoes, and escape this terrible atmosphere.

RUNS WILL NOT SAVE ONE YOU CLOSE/REFRESH THE PAGE

Controls

  • A/D or left/right: Move left and right
  • W/S or up/down: Increase or decrease your gravity
  • Space: Jump and Wall kick
  • R: restart current level
  • Escape: head back to main menu

All art, sfx, and assets were created by me during the duration of the jam.
